summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Building Inspection Advisory, Examining and Appeals Board will convene on March 19, 2024, at 11:30 A.M. at the Oak Cliff Municipal Center. The meeting aims to discuss key issues related to building inspections and appeals, ensuring equitable access to services for all residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting on February 20, 2024.
2. Briefing on a proposed ordinance to establish the Building and Fire Advisory and Appeals Board.
3. Update on the building permit application for 1140 W. Wheatland Road.

**Important Details**:  
The proposed ordinance aims to enhance the framework for building and fire safety oversight in Dallas. The update regarding the building permit application will provide insights into ongoing construction projects and compliance with city regulations.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss the proposed ordinance. Feedback and decisions regarding the building permit application will also be solicited, potentially leading to further actions based on the board's recommendations. 

The meeting will be accessible via video conference, and participants wishing to speak must register in advance.
